name: Potato Game (TouristHistories, Neanderl)
description:
Shovel all the Potatos you're getting delivered into the Barns on the left & right and avoid breaking the Lamp inside the house at all costs. But be warned, Potato-Delivery-Spawns will get faster over time!

Controls: Mouse,  A & D or ArrowKeys to Move, Spacebar, W or ArrowKeyUp to Jump and ESC for Menu.

Potato Game is a short little game made by Neandi &  TouristHistories  for Ludum Dare 52 with the Theme "Harvest" in just 72hours. It is our first Game ever made and Gameplay is quite simple.  Be sure to share your highscore or any bugs you're running into in the comments down below! 

  • Coding by Neandi
  • Graphics by TouristHistories
  • Sounds:  Frog Legs Rag (1906, Piano roll by James Scott) and Pixabay are either Public Domain or free to use.
Thank you for playing! Known Issues (we dont know how to fix this yet, sorry):  Mouse (Shovel) moves and can cause Game Over while Cutscene is triggered Occasional Tearing - yeah we basically dont know how to fix this yet, cause we're totally new to this.Due to Spambots we had to temporarily disable comments on here :(
